alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; O'Brien; Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 22 at 1:07PM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Dickinson, Sioux and O`Brien Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
